A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This may have surpassed Empire Strikes Back as the best of the saga.  OUr new Hero finds her way\, as Kylo Ren descends fully into darkness.  Luke struggles with his own demons and learns as much as he teaches.  There is a full range of emotion in this chapter\, I laughed\, and cheered\, and I cried - and not just over Carrie.  An absolutely incredible Star Wars experience.  I cannot wait to see the final chapter.
